title: PolyRoyale
description:
Play on small selectable PolyRoyale maps with a small number of players. You fight against bots and players as solo, duo or squad. Various weapons will help you survive. Choose a suitable look for your player character at the beginning. Be ready and jump out of a plane and fly through the air looking for a good place to land. And show that you can be a survivor. Only one can win. Just Find It 2
Go into battle and grab the crown , you fight each other in solo, duo or squad mode. And be careful, you are trapped in a big cylinder that gets smaller and smaller and gradually changes its location In Endless Deathmatch, players compete against each other in an endless battle. Endless Deathmatch offers the possibility to go into battle alone, in a duo or in a squad.

system_requirements.Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
